title: Cofiguration on Pixel2XL with Android Q coping data from a cabled device loops
content:
I've tried to configure from zero a Pixel2XL with Android Q Beta 2 and coping data and settings from another phone, Xiaomi MI A1 with Android One, using the cable provided.
The process seems to run in fact I see a screen were there are a message that confirms that the copy of data from the older phone is done but at a certain point it try to find new software update and then restarts from the previous screen and so the loop begin.

The problem is that the developer options are not enable same as the oem unlock in fact I can not use fastboot commands in order to restore Android 9 Pie or any other factory image.

Any ideas on how resolve?
Thanks in advance
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 2
